title: New: Tree – Demons (Feat. Beat Culture & Lena Kuhn)
content:
Not to be confused with Chicago rapper, California’s Tree has featured on CitR before, and now appears to truly be spreading his roots, pardon the pun.

With his debut EP Demons coming out on R&S Records later in the year, he’s dropped the first track to be taken from it, featuring electro-wizard Beat Culture and vocalist Lena Kuhn. There’s a unique, poetic element to Tree, merging rap influences with his own beats and Yoni Wolf level of story telling prowess. Check out the fantastic Demons below.

face the demons from my past life
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
